name: Cold Cable: Lifeshift (itch)
description:
Take role as a survivor in COLD CABLE: LIFESHIFT. After the Hope Garden ore mining started, a new sickness spread trough the living: part of population exposed to it become monsters! Yea, and it's up to you to discover what's going on and most important: how to fix that BIG problem.

Cold Cable: Lifeshift (CCLS) is a 3D First Person action-puzzle game, with survival elements, where you have to gather supplies, control radiation level and shoot monsters on your way to reach the next level. If you want to play this game, get ready for the chaos.

What you're going to find in this game:

  • Multiple Levels
  • Unique Scripts
  • Horror Atmosphere
  • Custom models and audio

Full version  available on Steam.
